name: GuppY
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: An easy, free web portal, GuppY will allow you to generate very easily a complete and interactive web site. It requires no database.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<div class="foot"><span class='copyright'>  <a class='copyright' href='http:\/\/www.freeguppy.org\/' title='GuppY site' target='_blank'> Site powered by GuppY v([\d\.]+) <\/a>)
(?-mix:  <!--\[  GuppY v([\d\.]+) CeCILL Copyright \(C\) [\d]{4}\-[\d]{4} by Laurent Duveau \- http:\/\/www.freeguppy.org\/  \]-->)
